title: First Step
longDescription: Make your first USDC deposits on Hyperliquid to start your trading journey.

title: Rookie Trader
longDescription: Complete your very first order on Hyperliquid and get a taste of the action.

title: Million Dollar Trader
longDescription: Achieve over 1,000,000 USD in total trading volume.

title: Profit Pro
longDescription: Achieve over 100% Profit and Loss on a single trade.

title: Whale Down
shortDescription: Get liquidated on a large position.
longDescription: Get liquidated on a position worth over $10,000.

title: Averaging Down Artisan
shortDescription: Master the art of averaging down.
longDescription: When a position is down by at least 20%, average down by increasing your position size by at least 50% over 3 separate trades.

title: All-In Champion
shortDescription: Go all-in on a single position.
longDescription: Allocate 80% or more of your total equity into a single position.

title: Explorer
shortDescription: Interact with Hyperliquid and a partner protocol.
longDescription: Interact with Hyperliquid DEX and at least one ecosystem DeFi protocol (e.g., Kinetiq).

title: Liquidity Farmer
shortDescription: Provide liquidity on an ecosystem protocol.
longDescription: Provide at least $1,000 of liquidity to a vault on an ecosystem protocol (e.g., Kinetiq, Hyperps).

title: Ecosystem Staker
shortDescription: Stake tokens on a partner protocol.
longDescription: Stake at least $1,000 worth of HLP or other tokens on a partner protocol.

title: DeFi Borrower
shortDescription: Borrow from a lending protocol in the ecosystem.
longDescription: Borrow at least $1,000 of assets from a lending protocol within the Hyperliquid ecosystem.

title: Yield Optimizer
shortDescription: Use a yield aggregator in the ecosystem.
longDescription: Deposit at least $1,000 of assets into a yield aggregator that uses Hyperliquid.

title: HIP3 Market Architect
longDescription: Deploy a new perpetual market on Hyperliquid via HIP-3.
